name: KPI Dashboard
title: Financial Analytics KPIs
description: Key performance indicators for financial market analysis

elements.title: Total Market Volume (Today)
elements.query: SELECT SUM(total_volume) as market_volume FROM `financial-analytics-demo.financial_data.market_metrics` WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE() - 1

elements.title: Average Volatility
elements.query: SELECT AVG(volatility) as avg_volatility FROM `financial-analytics-demo.financial_data.market_metrics` WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE() - 1

elements.title: Positive Price Change %
elements.query: SELECT COUNT(IF(price_change_pct > 0, 1, NULL)) / COUNT(*) * 100 as pct_positive FROM `financial-analytics-demo.financial_data.market_metrics` WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE() - 1

elements.title: Total Transactions
elements.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_txns FROM `financial-analytics-demo.financial_data.market_trades` WHERE DATE(timestamp) = CURRENT_DATE() - 1
